interaction_description: Black rats feed on human food and trash, and can spread diseases like leptospirosis. They breed very rapidly and cause damage to human society as well as our ecosystems.

species.name: Black Rat
species.description: Black rats are disease carriers and breed out of control.

species.name: Human Garbage
species.description: Humans littering and discarding garbage inconsiderately harms plant life, and encourages rodents to breed.
